    • Method Detail

      • isRegistered

        public static boolean isRegistered(java.lang.String email)
        Checks to see if a user is registered given an email.
        Precondition:
        requires email != null;
        Postcondition:
        ensures True if the user is registered, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        email - the email to check
        Returns:
        true if user is registered

      • registerUser

        public static int registerUser(java.lang.String firstName,
               java.lang.String lastName,
               java.lang.String email)
                        throws DatabaseException
        Registers a user.
        Precondition:
        requires firstName != null;
        requires lastName != null;
        requires email != null;
        requires The user does not already exist.
        Postcondition:
        ensures The new user is registered and their id is returned.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the user's first name
        lastName - the user's last name
        email - the user's email
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if email already exists in DB

      • loginUser

        public static User loginUser(java.lang.String email)
                      throws DatabaseException
        Logs in a user and returns the corresponding User object.
        Precondition:
        requires email != null;
        requires The user already is registered.
        Postcondition:
        ensures The User's corresponding User Object is returned.
        Parameters:
        email - the user's email
        Returns:
        the User object or null if user for given email doesn't exist
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if email doesn't exist in DB
